message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 400k, I'll take 600k, a good deal!
I'll give you a better deal this time, take 70% and I'll get 30%
You're being too greedy, 55/45 is a fair split!
I'll give you a bigger share this time, 80% for you, 20% for me
You're getting desperate, I'll take 52% and you get 48%
